Question: After her marriage with the Prince of Wales, this person quickly became involved in the official duties of the Royal Family.
Hints: In Oman, the Sultan of Oman presented this person with a Queen's ransom in jewels.
This person was also given a chest full of gold jewelry, a silver tea set, and a gold embroidered Bedouin gown.
This person wore a dress valued at £9000 with a 25-foot (8-metre) train.
